Author: livipup
Text: You might just need to build some core strength. Also understand that if you're not flexing your muscles your stomach can seem flabby even without any belly fat. I'm a girl, but I carry almost no fat on my belly yet if I lay on my side or whatever I can still see how it shifts around from gravity. If I still had the kind of core strength I did in high school I could just flex my muscles and I wouldn't be able to see that, but I also wouldn't be flexing constantly because that would be weird and uncomfortable.

Author: wild_banana_cookie
Text: Not sure if you wanted an answer or not but weight training will help you build muscle and lose fat. A bit of research can go far to help you.
